name: Virus Exterminator (DCGame)
description:
if you boring because you cannot go out from home ? you can play this game ! you can defeat all the virus ! this game just like STR but this game have 1 gun and STR have to defeat robot but This game, we have to defeat virus this game have amazing story and have 2 mission but its still needs to be repaired because the game have problem like lag problem and background problem i hope its not disturb when you playing

this game is for windows, mac and, linux( but specialy for windows)
